programme.title: Scented With Love
programme.desc: After training as a junior perfumer in Paris, Rosalie fails to secure a job in France, and must return home to her small home town with her sister. With a small inheritance, she decides to try to rent a store to sell her own perfume. The only space available is shared with the local furniture store, owned by the handsome Ryan.

programme.title: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Marc Reid, a romance novelist, is set up on a blind date by his over-excited sister. Marc, a little less than enthusiastic, ends up picking up the wrong girl from the apartment complex.

programme.title: A Heart Apart
programme.desc: A quick spreading virus has shut down the world. But when Kenzie and Chase connect in the unlikeliest of ways, they are faced with a perplexing question: how does dating work when you have to stay six feet apart?

programme.title: Love in Tahiti
programme.desc: Brielle has always believed the ocean floor is full of treasures just waiting to be found. Over the years she has dived to find coins, lost jewelry and more in the waters of Tahiti. Instead of profiting from them, she loves reuniting people with their lost valuables. When she finds a class ring and returns it to Marcus, a handsome US Navy serviceman, Brielle soon discovers what has been missing in her life – a treasure of the heart.

programme.title: Christmas Angel
programme.desc: Ashley feels alone this Christmas as she searches fruitlessly for a job to support herself and her dog, Dash. But her neighbor Nick knows exactly what to do. He offers her a job as his assistant in the best work of all----helping others. There's only one catch: Ashley can't tell anyone that her boss is a sort of Secret Santa. When a nosy reporter, Will, takes interest in Ashley, she struggles to keep Nick's secret while protecting her heart.

programme.title: Destined At Christmas
programme.desc: Two people meet on Black Friday, get separated, and yearn to reunite—if only they knew each other’s last names and numbers. Can destiny help them find each other by Christmas?

programme.title: The Farmer and the Belle – Saving Santaland
programme.desc: When she visits her childhood home, sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

programme.title: Scented With Love
programme.desc: After training as a junior perfumer in Paris, Rosalie fails to secure a job in France, and must return home to her small home town with her sister. With a small inheritance, she decides to try to rent a store to sell her own perfume. The only space available is shared with the local furniture store, owned by the handsome Ryan.

programme.title: Moving McAllister
programme.desc: Rick Robinson is a ladder-climbing law intern from Miami with four days until the Bar Exam. Desperate to score points with his boss (McAllister), he commits to a favor he can't afford. He ends up in a rundown truck headed to L.A. with his boss's possessions, his Hollywood-bound niece, and her pet pig. Amidst hitch-hikers, breakdowns, and assorted local yokels, Rick finds love, life and maybe himself in this trans-American road trip from hell.

programme.title: A Heart Apart
programme.desc: A quick spreading virus has shut down the world. But when Kenzie and Chase connect in the unlikeliest of ways, they are faced with a perplexing question: how does dating work when you have to stay six feet apart?

programme.title: Love in Tahiti
programme.desc: Brielle has always believed the ocean floor is full of treasures just waiting to be found. Over the years she has dived to find coins, lost jewelry and more in the waters of Tahiti. Instead of profiting from them, she loves reuniting people with their lost valuables. When she finds a class ring and returns it to Marcus, a handsome US Navy serviceman, Brielle soon discovers what has been missing in her life – a treasure of the heart.

programme.desc: Ashley feels alone this Christmas as she searches fruitlessly for a job to support herself and her dog, Dash. But her neighbor Nick knows exactly what to do. He offers her a job as his assistant in the best work of all----helping others. There's only one catch: Ashley can't tell anyone that her boss is a sort of Secret Santa. When a nosy reporter, Will, takes interest in Ashley, she struggles to keep Nick's secret while protecting her heart.

programme.title: Destined At Christmas
programme.desc: Two people meet on Black Friday, get separated, and yearn to reunite—if only they knew each other’s last names and numbers. Can destiny help them find each other by Christmas?

programme.title: The Farmer and the Belle – Saving Santaland
programme.desc: When she visits her childhood home, sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

programme.title: Hometown Remedy
programme.desc: A busy surgeon heads back home to celebrate her father becoming mayor. But after a chance encounter with the town's only doctor-and most eligible bachelor-she witnesses true compassion which might be the prescription this doctor needs.
